page.pg_title: Benefits of using the Leases tab

text_content.paragraph: Working in the Leases tab has these specific benefits:

bullets.bullet: Fingertip access to nearly all lease records data, including payment obligations, special obligations, and provisions/remarks
Ability to generate your own lease schedules, and
Ability to generate lease Exhibit A
